Desc1: <color=#00FF7F>Build on Overturned Area</color> to <color=#00FF7F>preview the contents within a 2-tile distance</color> and <color=#00FF7F>receive 1 Construction Permit</color> daily from this day onward.
Decrease the cost of creating Bonfire by 1.
Flip open the tile closest to the Bonfire automatically when you create a Bonfire.
Flip open a tile within the Bonfire's range at the start of each day.
<color=#00FF7F>Build on Overturned Area</color> to randomly <color=#00FF7F>eliminate</color> 1 <color=#00FF7F>Danger Zone</color> within its range.
Removed automatically once the Arrow Tower takes effect and receive 2 Build Energy.
The Arrow Tower will instantly eliminate all enemies within range.
Arrow Tower will become effective against bosses, but it will only reduce 30% of the boss's current HP (forced to enter battle).
<color=#00FF7F>Build on Overturned Area</color> for its Impact Range to receive <color=#00FF7F>Colored Resource +150</color>.
Decrease the cost of creating Piggy Bank by 1.
Eliminate enemies within the Piggy Bank's range and increase the color levels of 3 colors by an extra 2 levels.
After opening a total of 3 tiles within the Piggy Bank's range (Each Piggy Bank can only trigger this once), receive the specified number of Colored Levels & Colored Resources.
Gain 1 Construction Point at the start of each day (can be triggered multiple times each day; stackable)
When you modify a tile within the building's range, get 1 Build Energy back.
Every Building in the current map can generate 30 Coins every round.
Every Building in the current map can generate 1 Construction Point every round.
fightevent unofficial - Fighting within the building's range will lower Enemy DMG by 10/20/30% and increase DMG taken by Enemies by 10/20/30%.

Change a tile that is <color=#00FF7F>not Yellow</color> into <color=#00FF7F>Yellow</color>.
